divs: Sighting DetailsI was looking out of my window, toward Pleasantdale rd. I saw a white object come in roof top and then dissappeared. I then looked up and saw it ,it was blinking and starlight. We noticed that it was trying to stay still was having trouble. It was wabbling. My husband and son also watched it. There was a lots of planes in the area. this was not a plane.I had to go and do something, when I came back it was gone.This time I felt OK. not sick.
Summary: looked out of window I saw an object come rooftop and took off, we watched it for a while.
trends: There have been 95 other sightings in Atlanta
There were no other sightings in Atlanta on or around December 12th 2008
